experience.description: Building a VC Platform that helps founders beyond just funds, with a focus on two key pillars:1) Eximius Edge: Offering extensive support to our portfolio founders through initiatives such as hiring assistance, community building, strategic partnerships, and effective marketing strategies.2) Eximius Echo: Targeted marketing and growth efforts to elevate thought leadership, increase deal flow and strengthen brand presence.

recommendations: Shailendra Singh Rao ‚ÄúPankhudi is one of those few people who have the ability to not only generate interest in the work, but also keep all the peers and team mates involved. Even as a student intern, her dynamism and thought provoking ideas make it a pleasure to work with her. Tight, almost impossible deadlines have never been an issue and her ability to grasp the "need" and the 'wow' factor have made working with her very pleasurable experience. During her tenure as an Intern at Storysutra.in, she has been working really hard and has always encouraged and guided her other team members, even in the areas beyond the routine roles and responsibilities. She will prove to be a Precious asset for any organization, Always. I wish her all the very best for her bright future. ‚Äù

Anusuya Sah ‚ÄúMy name is Anusuya Sah and I was HOD Commerce stream in St. Mary's Convent Nainital. Pankhudi Kedia has been my pupil in the school. She showed exemplary skills, always trying to learn beyond the classroom teaching methodology. In addition for her drive for academic excellence, she showed interest in many extra and co-curricular activities . She demonstrated creativity and Leadership skills as she conducted and coordinated various activities in school.Recently on connecting with her on Linkedin, I realized that Pankhudi is a girl who can make her way through all adversity and emerge a winner. I wish her all the best in all her future endeavours.‚Äù
